decisions.text: I have previous work experience and I want to manage people or projects
I like to work with farm animals
I like to communicate
I am interested in business, human resources or marketing
I am interested in construction
I want to lead educational initiatives
I like to work with technology
I like to travel
I am interested in retail
I am a creative and artistic person
I am interested in economy and supporting businesses to succeed
I am an aspiring artist
I am intrigued by working in media
I want to support business success with financial services
I am interested in financial investments, shares and markets
I want to find or train the best people for the job
I like to keep statistics or I store things and catalogue them
I can convince other people about my opinion
I am interested in boats or aeroplanes
I like to design things, clothes or buildings or even raw maps and blueprints
I like to build things, or take things apart and see how they work
Science is my thing!
I want to teach
I like to work with kids and teenagers
I prefer to teach adults
I can teach drama, music, art or languages
I want to help people to stay healthy or address their health issues
I want to support doctors
I feel like I can help people feel better by talking to them
Human anatomy, yes please, blood ... no issue!
Human birth is a miracle, and I want to be a part of it!
I want to work with computers and technology
I want to design or build great apps and websites
Cyber Security is one of the most critical issues of this generation
I want to support technology development and build reliable and fast networks to connect everyone
I want to ensure that everyone is treated equally, legally and with respect
I want to fight for legal justice
I want to help people, take care of their mental health or bring social justice
